metadata.title: RZ/V: AI Partner: Is additional learning and other customized learning possible?

sections.content:
Question:
Is support including additional learning and other customized AI learning also provided?
Answer:
Whether customization including learning is supported differs depending on the partner. 
Please contact the respective partner for more information.
